articles.description: He said: 'There's the unknown aspect … there's that pit in my stomach … I really don't want Megan and I to be at odds … she's been my best friend for 15 years and I don't want to lose that.'
articles.content:
Brian Austin Green recently confirmed his split with wife Megan Fox after a decade of marriage. 
But the Beverly Hills, 90210 appears to be in good spirits as his ex sparks romance rumors with Machi… [+2142 chars]
